ForecastingSourceDefinition.name: ForecastingSourceDefinition
ForecastingSourceDefinition.description: Represents the object, measure, date type, and hierarchy that a forecast uses to project sales.

CategoryField.description: Name of the forecast category that is associated with the forecast type.

DateField.description: Field that is used for the forecast type’s date type. For example, the CloseDate field on Opportunity is used for opportunity close date–based forecast types.

DeveloperName.description: Required. The name of the forecasting source definition.

FamilyField.description: Use this field to group forecasts by product family.

FullName.description: The full name of the forecasting source definition.

Language.description: The language of the forecasting source definition.

MasterLabel.description: Required. Controlling label for this forecasting source definition.

MeasureField.description: Field that is used for the forecast type’s measure. For example, the Amount field on Opportunity is associated with revenue-based forecast types.

Metadata.description: The metadata of the forecasting source definition.

SourceObject.description: Required. Object associated with this forecasting source definition.

Territory2Field.description: For a territory-based forecast type, indicates the field that is used for territory information.For user role–based forecast types, this value is null.
